oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Israel Putnam
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Engraving of General Israel Putnam in uniform, seated on his horse.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Generals; Uniforms; Horses; Portraits
Putnam, Israel, 1718-1790
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Israel Putnam was an American army general and Freemason who fought at the Battle of Bunker Hill (1775) during the Revolutionary War (1775–1783). He was popularly known as "Old Put." The engraving is from a painting by Alonzo Chappel.
